name: Key pad - Interactive component
description:
This prototype uses interactive components to demonstrate a new feature that the Figma team will be launching soon.


If you are part of the beta (see below) you can open the prototype and type a code using your keyboard. This is helpful to learn if like me, you want to introduce keyboard commands or text entry into your prototypes.


This file uses features only available in the beta release so you won't be able to preview the full working prototype until you sign up for the program here: https://help.figma.com/hc/en-us/articles/360061175334#h_01F13PW6A4YF8G3MGD2GG3Y4AR
